dm:document.description: DM instance that illustrates USP events.

event.name: CWMPTransferComplete!
event.description: Inform the ACS of the completion (either successful or unsuccessful) of a file transfer that was not specifically requested by the ACS... {{issue|Argument names are shown with leading "#" characters as a reminder that they don't exist in the data model.}}

parameter.name: AnnounceURL
parameter.description: The URL on which the CPE listened to the announcements that led to this transfer being performed, or an empty string if this transfer was not performed as a result of an announcement, or {{empty}} if no such URL is available.

parameter.name: TransferURL
parameter.description: The URL from or to which this transfer was performed, or {{empty}} if no such URL is available.

parameter.name: IsDownload
parameter.description: Indicates whether the autonomous transfer was a download ({{true}}) or an upload ({{false}}).

parameter.name: FileType
parameter.description: An integer followed by a space followed by the file type description. Only the following values are currently defined for the {{param}} argument: {{enum}} The following format is defined to allow the unique definition of vendor-specific file types: * "X <VENDOR> <Vendor-specific identifier>" ...

parameter.name: FileSize
parameter.description: The size of the file in bytes, or zero if this information is not available or if the CPE chooses not to make it available.

parameter.name: TargetFileName
parameter.description: The name of the file on the target (CPE) file system...

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: The numerical fault code as defined in {{bibref|TR-069a5|Section A.5.1}}...

parameter.name: FaultString
parameter.description: A human-readable text description of the fault. This field SHOULD be {{empty}} if the {{param|FaultCode}} equals 0 (zero).

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time transfer was started in UTC...

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the transfer was fully completed and applied in UTC...

parameter.name: BootParameterNumberOfEntries
parameter.description: {{numentries}}

object.name: BootParameter.{i}.
object.description: ...provides the Controller with the ability to dictate the Parameters that are delivered by the Boot Notification...

parameter.name: Enable
parameter.description: Enables or disables this {{object}}.

parameter.name: ParameterName
parameter.description: A pattern that describes the Parameter(s) to be included in the {{object|#.Boot!}} Event... {{issue|We need an ''event'' template for referencing events; for now ''object'' works.}}

event.name: Boot!
event.description: Boot event configured via the {{object|BootParameter}} table and maybe requested via a USP operation.

parameter.name: CommandKey
parameter.description: The ''command_key'' supplied when requesting the boot, or {{empty}} if the boot was not requested via a USP operation.

parameter.name: Cause
parameter.description: The cause of the boot.

object.name: Parameter.{i}.
object.description: Boot parameters configured via the {{object|##.BootParameter}} table.

parameter.name: Path
parameter.description: Full parameter path.

parameter.name: Value
parameter.description: Parameter value (as a string).

parameter.name: PeriodicNotifInterval
parameter.description: ...the duration in seconds of the interval...

parameter.name: PeriodicNotifTime
parameter.description: ...determine when the USP Agent will issue a Periodic Notification...

event.name: Periodic!
event.description: Periodic event configured via the {{param|PeriodicNotifInterval}} and {{param|PeriodicNotifTime}} parameters.

event.name: Timer!
event.description: Timer event requested via a USP operation.

parameter.name: CommandKey
parameter.description: The ''command_key'' supplied when requesting the timer event.

event.name: TransferComplete!

parameter.name: CommandKey
parameter.description: The ''command_key'' supplied when requesting the transfer, or {{empty}} if the transfer was not requested via a USP operation.

parameter.name: TransferType
parameter.description: The type of transfer.

parameter.name: FileType
parameter.description: An integer followed by a space followed by the file type description. Only the following values are currently defined for the {{param}} argument: {{enum}} The following format is defined to allow the unique definition of vendor-specific file types: * "X <VENDOR> <Vendor-specific identifier>" ...

parameter.name: TransferURL
parameter.description: The URL from or to which this transfer was performed, or {{empty}} if no such URL is available.

parameter.name: StartTime
parameter.description: The date and time transfer was started in UTC...

parameter.name: CompleteTime
parameter.description: The date and time the transfer was fully completed and applied in UTC...

parameter.name: Requestor
parameter.description: ID of Controller that requested the transfer, or {{empty}} if no Controller requested it. {{issue|This is called ''operation_source'' in the protobuf schema.}}

parameter.name: FaultCode
parameter.description: The numerical fault code as defined in... {{issue|This is what it's called in CWMP TransferComplete. It's called ''xfer_err.err_code'' in the protobuf schema.}}

parameter.name: FaultString
parameter.description: A human-readable text description of the fault. This field SHOULD be {{empty}} if the {{param|FaultCode}} equals 0 (zero). {{issue|This is what it's called in CWMP TransferComplete. It's called ''xfer_err.err_msg'' in the protobuf schema.}}
